amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce the salary of the Special Assistant to the Director of Programming at Voice of America to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 244, 2 Present (Roll no. 300).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 244, 2 Present (Roll no. 300).
